CustomField.description: If selected, and the Display Schedule Options Window for the Resourcing component is enabled, users can select whether to retain the preferred schedule on the resource request when assigning a resource. If selected, and the Lightning App Builder property is disabled, the preferred schedule is retained automatically when assigning a resource.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When True, an existing schedule held on a resource request is reused for a subsequent assignment on that request rather than creating a new schedule for the assignment. The default value is False.
CustomField.label: Retain Schedule On Assign
